id.description: id is the unique identifier for the function.

startLine.description: start_line is the line number in the source file of the first line of the function.

name.description: name is the name of the function.

systemName.description:
system_name describes the name of the function, as identified by the
system. For instance, it can be a C++ mangled name.

filename.description: filename is the name of the source file of the function.

metastorev1alpha1Function.description: Function describes metadata of a source code function.

functionId.description: function_id is the ID of the function.

line.description: line is the line number in the source file of the referenced function.

metastorev1alpha1Line.description: Line describes a source code function and its line number.

id.description: id is the unique identifier for the location.

address.description: address is the memory address of the location if present.

mappingId.description: mapping_id is the unique identifier for the mapping associated with the location.

isFolded.description: is_folded indicates whether the location is folded into the previous location.

lines.description:
lines are the call frames represented by this location. Multiple lines
indicate they have been inlined.

metastorev1alpha1Location.description: Location describes a single location of a stack traces.

id.description: id is the unique identifier for the mapping.

start.description: start is the start address of the mapping.

limit.description: limit is the length of the address space of the mapping.

offset.description: offset in the binary that corresponds to the first mapped address.

file.description: file is the name of the file associated with the mapping.

buildId.description: build_id is the build ID of the mapping.

hasFunctions.description: has_functions indicates whether the mapping has associated functions.

hasFilenames.description: has_filenames indicates whether the mapping has associated filenames.

hasLineNumbers.description: has_line_numbers indicates whether the mapping has associated line numbers.

hasInlineFrames.description: has_inline_frames indicates whether the mapping has associated inline frames.

link.description: link that can be used to access the profile.

polarsignalsshareUploadResponse.description: UploadResponse represents the response with the link that can be used to access the profile.

nodes.title: nodes are the nodes in the callgraph

edges.title: edges are the edges connecting nodes in the callgraph

cumulative.title: cumulative is the total cumulative value of the callgraph

v1alpha1Callgraph.title: Callgraph is the callgraph report type

id.title: id is the unique id of the edge

source.title: source represents the id of the source node

target.title: target represents the id of the target node

cumulative.title: cumulative is the cumulative value of the edge

isCollapsed.title: is_collapsed indicates if the edge is collapsed

v1alpha1CallgraphEdge.title: CallgraphEdge represents an edge in the graph

id.title: id is the unique id of the node

meta.title: meta is the metadata about the node

cumulative.title: cumulative is the cumulative value of the node

v1alpha1CallgraphNode.title: CallgraphNode represents a node in the graph

location.title: location is the location for the code

mapping.title: mapping is the mapping into code

v1alpha1CallgraphNodeMeta.title: TopNodeMeta is the metadata for a given node

root.title: root is the root of the flame graph

total.title: total is the total weight of the flame graph

unit.title: unit is the unit represented by the flame graph

height.title: height is the max height of the graph

v1alpha1Flamegraph.title: Flamegraph is the flame graph report type

meta.title: meta is the metadata about the node

cumulative.title: cumulative is the cumulative value of the node

v1alpha1FlamegraphNode.title: FlamegraphNode represents a node in the graph

location.title: location is the location for the code

mapping.title: mapping is the mapping into code

v1alpha1FlamegraphNodeMeta.title: FlamegraphNodeMeta is the metadata for a given node

cumulative.title: cumulative is the cumulative value of the graph

children.title: children are the list of the children of the root node

v1alpha1FlamegraphRootNode.title: FlamegraphRootNode is a root node of a flame graph

name.description: name is the name of the profile type.

sampleType.description: sample_type is the type of the samples in the profile.

sampleUnit.description: sample_unit is the unit of the samples in the profile.

periodType.description: period_type is the type of the periods in the profile.

periodUnit.description: period_unit is the unit of the periods in the profile.

delta.description: delta describes whether the profile is a delta profile.

v1alpha1ProfileType.description: ProfileType is the type of a profile as well as the units the profile type is available in.

types.description: types is the list of available profile types.

v1alpha1ProfileTypesResponse.description: ProfileTypesResponse is the response to retrieve the list of available profile types.

flamegraph.title: flamegraph is a flamegraph representation of the report

pprof.title: pprof is a pprof profile as compressed bytes

top.title: top is a top list representation of the report

callgraph.title: callgraph is a callgraph nodes and edges representation of the report

v1alpha1QueryResponse.title: QueryResponse is the returned report for the given query

list.title: list are the list of ordered elements of the table

reported.title: reported is the number of lines reported

total.title: total is the number of lines that exist in the report

unit.title: unit is the unit represented by top table

v1alpha1Top.title: Top is the top report type

meta.title: meta is the metadata about the node

cumulative.title: cumulative is the cumulative value of the node

flat.title: flat is the flat value of the node

diff.title: diff is the diff value between two profiles

v1alpha1TopNode.title: TopNode is a node entry in a top list

location.title: location is the location for the code

mapping.title: mapping is the mapping into code

v1alpha1TopNodeMeta.title: TopNodeMeta is the metadata for a given node
